briefTitle: Neulasta-controlled Trial of F-627 in Women With Breast Cancer Receiving Myelotoxic Chemotherapy
officialTitle: A Phase III, Randomized, Multi-Centre, Open-Label, Fixed Dose, NeulastaÂ® Active-Controlled Clinical Trial of F-627 in Women With Breast Cancer Receiving Myelotoxic Chemotherapy
summary: This is a randomized, multi-center, single dose, open-label and Neulasta controlled phase 3 study to evaluate the efficacy and safety of F-627 in women with Stage I - III invasive breast cancer receiving chemotherapy treatment.

primaryOutcome.measure: Duration in Days of Grade 4 Neutropenia in Chemotherapy Cycle 1
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: The first of 4, 21-day chemotherapy cycles (average 3 weeks)
